name: Image LLM processor
description: Ask questions about any local image file. This tool passes your image and prompt to a multimodal LLM for analysis.
author: @@official.shinkai

llm_provider.description: Optional default LLM to use. Leave it empty to use the default LLM from the Agent, chat or task. Make sure to use a LLM supporting image processing. Use LLM IDs as displayed in Shinkai (e.g., 'shinkai_free_trial', 'gemini_2_5_pro').

image_path.description: The path to the local image file. Use file formats supported by the selected LLM.

llm_override.description: Optional override for the LLM provider. Leave empty to use default. Make sure to use a LLM supporting image processing. Use LLM IDs as displayed in Shinkai (e.g., 'shinkai_free_trial', 'gemini_2_5_pro').

prompt.description: The prompt for the LLM analysis

message.description: The response message from the LLM
